Directions: In a large skillet or wok, saute garlic in oil for 1 minute. Add the shrimp, mushrooms and onions; stir-fry for 1 minute. Stir in the broth; cook 2 minutes longer or until shrimp turn pink. Serve over rice; garnish with lemon.
Ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
